resources.string: This hotspot is pretty damn safe. It\'s even known to be safe by us!
This hotspot seems pretty safe. It has all the traits of a safe hotspot but it\'s an unknown network to us!
This hotspot is not very safe. You should be cautious with what you do on it.
This hotspot is not safe. Be very careful with your activity!
You can view some more details about the results below.
A captive portal is present. This means that you must first accept some terms before you\'re allowed to use the network.
There\'s no captive portal. This means that you can use the network without accepting any terms. This is generally not very safe!
Some errors occurred while checking for the captive portal.
The captive portal has a valid HTTPS certificate. This means that we can be sure that the portal is not tampered with.
The captive portal has a HTTPS certificate but it doesn\'t appear to be valid. Be cautious, this could potentially be very dangerous!
The captive portal does not have a certificate. This is generally unsafe and means the portal could possibly be tampered with.
This network matches known and verified information. This means that the network should be very safe!
This network is known but it does not match the known information. This means that the network is most likely compromised or has been tampered with!
This network is unknown to us.
